content.raw: @{557058:14b7fd50-d65a-47a8-825c-fa89681d07bd} my colleague is testing Urban Qualification with with remote control \(from console, ROS keyboard control\), visualizing lidar scan and images via RViz. It is sometimes working and sometimes not and in RViz you can see that data are sometimes not coming … maybe it is the same issue?
